transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello. Ji sir Elma baat kar rahi hu good morning IndiaMART se aap se baat hui thi na Friday ko.
Customer: Boliye boliye boliye.
Executive: Mai keh rahi thi ki ek video meet karni thi sir aap se.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: Jo maine bola tha na ki ek baar video meet pe aa jayega system pe to ek baar hum connect kar lenge.
Executive: To sir kab tak aap aa payenge ek baar.
Customer: Chalu rakhiye sir.
Executive: Sir mai keh rahi thi ki 10:30 baje 10:30 baje.
Customer: Mai abhi kisi ki taraf se.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: On kar raha hu.
Customer: Kisi ki on kar raha hu. Achcha mai keh rahi thi sir mai abhi instantly to nahi kar paungi aap mujhe 10:30 baje aap se connect karu mai.
Customer: Theek hai aap call kijiye.
Customer: Theek hai mai 10:30 baje.
Customer: Uske baad bhi 10-15 minute unse role hai. Isme actually hamesha kidhar na kidhar rehta hai. Isliye pura record to nahi hota hai ek aadmi rahega. Wo share karta hu aur aapke paas bhi record aayega madam. Aapne bhi check kiya na ki yaha pe local mein kitne bar bending ki inquiries aaye hai. Okay kitni suspended platform ki inquiry aayi hai aur humne purchase nahi kiya hai. Humne purchase kyu nahi kiya hai to hume hum purchase hi nahi kar paye.
Customer: Even though wo hume lead dikhai diya but wo purchase nahi hua aise.
Executive: Achcha. Dikhai hua upar notification mein aaya but consume nahi ho paya.
Customer: Aaya.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Achcha achcha. System se bhi wahi hai aur aise bhi sir.
Customer: Haan aur system se jyadatar mobile mein fast aata hai.
Executive: Achcha. Mobile mein immediately wo a export matlab notification aa jata hai. Notification ko click karne ke baad wo by lead hona chahiye. Jo choti moti inquiry hoti hai wo dikhti hai aise.
Executive: Achcha. Notification ko click karne ke baad waha pe by lead option aata hai. Magar jo mujhe chahiye bade equipments.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Usme wo ho nahi pa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha. Okay. Aapko wo dikh nahi rahi hai matlab jaise hi aap us pe click kar rahe hai to har by lead ke sath aisa ho raha hai ya fir ek single by lead ke sath matlab ki ek do lead mein ek baar ho ja raha hai ya.
Customer: Specific product ke liye.
Customer: Hmm. Abhi dekhiye mam bar bending bar cutting ka requirement hi nahi aaya hai mujhe. Abhi tak kam se kam paanch che inquiry to market mein floating hui hai. Hamare yaha pe.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan. To mujhe ek bhi by lead nahi dikhai diya uska reason kya ho sakta hai correct hai na.
Executive: Kis product ki baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Bar bending, bar cutting, suspended platform, trimming.
Executive: Sloter.
Executive: Achcha. Roller paver.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Jo fir kaun si aati hai hume mixer ka aata hai. Okay mixer hi dikhai dega saala mixer ke liye aap itna purchase aapko amount dene ki koi jarurat hi nahi hai. Usse achche to mere paas sabse piche pada hai.
Executive: Sir ye jo concrete mixer with lift system, concrete mixer in sab ki jo aayi hui hai unka kya hai sir?
Customer: Wahi aati hai.
Customer: Wo wo to le hi rahe magar mera mere paas itne by lead pade hai. Okay matlab mai mai aisa pakad ke chaliye din mein do teen kuch to by lead new by lead mujhe purchase karne ke liye aate hai. Correct hai na.
Customer: Wo kya purchase karu mai uska wo aise hi by lead hamari waste ja rahi hai. Agar aapne hamara record check kiya to mahine mein 15 15 by lead to waste hai humne wo purchase hi nahi kiya wo time duration ke liye lap ho gaya.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aur sir aap kya keh rahe hai 30 40 40 by lead lap hue hai.
Executive: Achcha. Sir karne ke bar bending machine ke liye aap keh rahe hai na ki aapko lead chahiye.
Customer: Ek hi nahi kam se kam saat aath product aise hai kyuki unka requirement hume matlab notification to aata hai magar mai by lead nahi kar pata hu wo.
Executive: Achcha theek hai. Sir aap na ek ji. Achcha sir aisa karte hai hum hai na 10:30 baje ka ek video meet ka karti hu theek hai. Usme hum ek baar connect karte hai aur jitni bhi matlab lead ka aap keh rahe ho ki problem aa raha hai wo hum properly sir usme discuss karte hai. Theek hai aap dekho sir ek aap aapki email id pe deke aaya hoga sir. Video meet with IndiaMART team ke naam se.
Customer: Theek hai aaya rahega mai check karta hu abhi mai usko accept haan usko accept kar lijiyega ek baar note down.
Executive: Note down kar lijiyega kaun se kaun se product mein karna hai.
Customer: Haan haan. System pe aane ke baad.
Executive: Theek hai to fir. Ji theek hai mai aapko aapko 10:30 pe call karti hu sir.
Customer: Theek hai mam chaliye.
Executive: Theek hai okay sir thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to see buyleads for specific products.

- Notification appears, but cannot buy lead.

- Many buyleads are wasted due to this issue.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a video meet at 10:30 AM.

- Will discuss the lead issue in the video meet.

- Asked to accept the video meet invite.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer to join video meet at 10:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notification, video meet, products
